alert.note: Alert for Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:56PM CDT until July 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR WESTERN WRIGHT COUNTY... At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maple Lake, or 7 miles west of Buffalo, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Monticello, Annandale, Montrose, Maple Lake, Waverly, Silver Creek, Rassat and Lake Maria State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
